message: Noiz pulls a few tissues from a box on the sideboard and hands them to me.
I take them and wipe up the semen dripping down my chin.
I finally have the presence of mind to worry if I went too far. I bit him pretty hard there, in the heat of the moment. He's not bleeding, right?
Well... Everyone's got their kinks. While I was a little surprised at first, it doesn't really bother me.
As my passion cools, I start to think about things that weren't bothering me a few minutes ago.
I don't know whether to call it a game or a joke gone off the rails.
Either way... when I took Noiz into my mouth... I don't think I'll ever forget how he melted beneath my attack.
He really does have a cute side.
Noiz sits up, fixes his clothes a bit, and gets off the bed.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You go first. I'll hop in after."
With that, he leaves the room. He didn't even blink.
